overview_of_class: This course examines theories and research dealing with communication in formal organizations and institutions. Various models of organizational communication are introduced, as well as historical and current research in the field. Students learn to analyze and integrate theory and research and apply what they learn to current organizations.
name: Theories of Organizational Communication
title: SCS COMM_ST 360-CN-19 Theories of Organizational Communication

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course examines theories and research dealing with communication in formal organizations and institutions. Various models of organizational communication are introduced, as well as historical and current research in the field. Students learn to analyze and integrate theory and research and apply what they learn to current organizations.
